nodes.text: Strength and Unity was a propaganda poster used by the Galactic Republic, and created by Angilar Bosh. It depicted a Wookiee, a Chagrian, a Gungan, a Mon Calamari, a green-skinned female Twi'lek, a Rodian, and a Gran looking up in reverence against a yellow background with the Republic symbol in the background at the top right hand corner, as well as two Coruscant air taxis flying overhead. It also featured the words "Strength and Unity" predominantly displayed in Aurebesh, as well as "We're in this together" at the bottom, also written in Aurebesh.
